title: Encore: Iran Contra | Don and Ed | 3
description:
When the story breaks that senior U.S. government officials secretly traded arms for hostages, Congress and the American people demand answers. Chief of Staff Don Regan and Attorney General Ed Meese begin building a wall around the President.  

This episode originally December 11, 2018.

Listen ad-free on Wondery+ here
